title: C implementation of simple shell program
description:
C implementation of simple shell program. Program is writted in C.

Source code for this application is found here github link

Installation:

Included Files

My assignment solution consists of the following files:

  • minishell.c
  • minishell.h
  • minishellfunc.h
  • makefile

Install as following:

You can run this program as follows (run from command line): 

$ make run

Compiler:

gcc version 4.6.3 (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.6.3-1ubuntu5)

Errors/Bugs:

One error I can not fix/find is that sometime you have to type "quit" 2 time to quitat it gives no result, after you type "quit" second time minishell quits, this is minor bug, but it is still there
details:
Project Details:

  • Handles regular shell commands
  • Handles background jobs
